## Sinc function

```{r echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
x <- seq(.05, 60, by = .05)
df <- data.frame(x = x, y = sin(x)/x)
p <- plot_ly(df, x = ~x, y = ~y, mode="lines")
layout(p, xaxis=list(title="x"), yaxis=list(title="sin(x) / x"))
```
